meanings.definition: A person who is new to a particular activity or field.
meanings.sent1: The newbies in the class were eager to learn.
meanings.sent2: The team welcomed the newbies with open arms.
meanings.sent3: The newbies accidentally pressed all the buttons at once!
meanings.sent4: In the world of coding, newbies are like explorers in a vast digital landscape.
meanings.sent5: The newbies' excitement was palpable as they embarked on their first project.

meanings.definition: Plural form of 'newbie', referring to multiple individuals who are new to a particular activity or field.
meanings.sent1: The newbies gathered together to share their experiences.
meanings.sent2: The conference was filled with newbies eager to network.
meanings.sent3: The newbies formed a support group to navigate their new environment.
meanings.sent4: In the world of gaming, newbies often band together to improve their skills.
meanings.sent5: The newbies' enthusiasm was infectious, spreading to everyone around them.
